law.catch_line: Sales contract made in violation of KRS 365.260 to 365.380 void.
law.text: Any contract, express or implied, made by any person in violation of any of the provisions of KRS 365.260 to 365.380, shall be void and no recovery shall be had thereon.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 280 sec. 8, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 147, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 243, sec. 8, effective May 18, 1956.
